qa.name: Sam
qa.appearance: Rugged, with a leather jacket and fedora

hf.name: Lila
hf.appearance: Petite, with glasses and a ponytail

tr.name: Old Man Jenkins
tr.appearance: Weathered, with a long white beard
tr.clothing: Worn-out overalls and a straw hat

xc.name: Ghost of Captain Blackbeard
xc.appearance: Translucent, with a pirate hat and coat

json_to_edit.voice_over: Little did we know, the old house held secrets beyond our wildest dreams.
json_to_edit.description: A team of adventurers explores an abandoned Victorian mansion, uncovering a hidden pirate treasure.
json_to_edit.lighting: Dim, with shafts of dusty sunlight
json_to_edit.name: Treasure in the Attic
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Sam, Lila, Old Man Jenkins, and the Ghost of Captain Blackbeard discover a long-lost pirate treasure in an abandoned house.

qa.action: A dilapidated Victorian mansion looms against a gray sky, its overgrown garden hinting at years of neglect.

hf.action: Sam and Lila cautiously enter the mansion's foyer, dust swirling around their feet as they look around in awe.

tr.action: Old Man Jenkins appears from the shadows, startling the explorers as he gestures towards the attic stairs.

xc.action: The team ascends the creaky staircase, their flashlights casting eerie shadows on the walls.

ka.action: Lila's eyes widen as she brushes cobwebs away, revealing a hidden door with a pirate symbol.

fn.action: The attic room is filled with gleaming treasure, and the translucent form of Captain Blackbeard materializes, watching the group.

af.action: Sam and Lila exchange triumphant looks as they examine the treasure, while Old Man Jenkins nods knowingly in the background.

edit_command: Add one more shot to the scene

updated_json.voice_over: Little did we know, the old house held secrets beyond our wildest dreams.
updated_json.description: A team of adventurers explores an abandoned Victorian mansion, uncovering a hidden pirate treasure.
updated_json.lighting: Dim, with shafts of dusty sunlight
updated_json.name: Treasure in the Attic
updated_json.scene_summary: Sam, Lila, Old Man Jenkins, and the Ghost of Captain Blackbeard discover a long-lost pirate treasure in an abandoned house.

qa.action: A dilapidated Victorian mansion looms against a gray sky, its overgrown garden hinting at years of neglect.

hf.action: Sam and Lila cautiously enter the mansion's foyer, dust swirling around their feet as they look around in awe.

tr.action: Old Man Jenkins appears from the shadows, startling the explorers as he gestures towards the attic stairs.

xc.action: The team ascends the creaky staircase, their flashlights casting eerie shadows on the walls.

ka.action: Lila's eyes widen as she brushes cobwebs away, revealing a hidden door with a pirate symbol.

fn.action: The attic room is filled with gleaming treasure, and the translucent form of Captain Blackbeard materializes, watching the group.

yz.action: A series of quick close-ups capture the team's faces: Sam's eyes gleam with excitement, Lila's jaw drops in awe, and Old Man Jenkins raises an eyebrow knowingly as they all react to the ghost and the treasure.

af.action: Sam and Lila exchange triumphant looks as they examine the treasure, while Old Man Jenkins nods knowingly in the background.

label.rationale: we can add one more shot to the scene to enhance the storytelling and provide additional depth to the treasure discovery. i'll add a new shot that focuses on the team's reaction to the treasure and the ghost, placing it after the wide shot of the attic room filled with treasure. this new shot will be a close-up of the characters' faces, showing their mix of excitement and fear as they process the supernatural encounter and the magnitude of their discovery. we'll need to update the number_of_shots field and add the new shot to the shots dictionary, as well as update the list_display_order.

value.action: A series of quick close-ups capture the team's faces: Sam's eyes gleam with excitement, Lila's jaw drops in awe, and Old Man Jenkins raises an eyebrow knowingly as they all react to the ghost and the treasure.
